DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics of KPS-0373 in SCD patients.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study of KPS-0373 in Patients With Spinocerebellar Degeneration (SCD)
DOC.criteria: Japanese SCD patients with mild to moderate ataxia (Completion of the KPS1301 study) Less than 75% of compliance in KPS1301 study
